0: Location wise it is great away from the hustle bustle of Kuta yet walking distance to the interesting shops eateries lining all the way to Seminyak
it is my 1st visit after a 12 years gap to Bali
Both my husband and l thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Stayed in lovely room with adjoining lounge room large balcony overlooking tropical pool
We stayed on a Scopon deal which included 50 off all drinks
The complimentary 6R photo with frame was a pleasant surprise
Staff very accommodating friendly and keen to help
Our room was upgraded to junior suite
The cleanles of the room is also good
I left after eating quickly as I was already late for another appointment
1: So did not really take advantage since it does not give you the feeling of a bigger room
The mall is just 10 minutes walking it is a perfect hotel in Bali
However I am shocked about the lack of safety awareness of the hotel staff
And it was evident we were walking into an international hotel resort chain as soon as we arrived
I spoke to reception about getting 2 connecting rooms with beds in both rooms as opposed to this suite
Special mention for Wila Eni Ayu Benny Lina Haity
Room was roomy and comfortable but smelled musty and there was an obvious sewage problem coming from the toilet area
But I can not open the blinds at night at all because of the horrendous spotlight on the verandah
We did not ask for an upgrade or any other type of extra service which i am sure you where hit with by other guests
I had been a bit frustrated because I could not open my room 3 times during my 8 nights stay and only the last time I had an urgent response from the receptionist
